title: Samurai Spy (Masahiro Shinoda, 1965)
description:
Years of warfare end in a Japan unified under the Tokugawa shogunate, and samurai spy Sasuke Sarutobi, tired of conflict, longs for peace. When a high-ranking spy named Tatewaki Koriyama defects from the shogun to a rival clan, however, the world of swordsmen is thrown into turmoil. After Sasuke is unwittingly drawn into the conflict, he tracks Tatewaki, while a mysterious, white-hooded figure seems to hunt them both. By taleÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s end, no one is who they seemed to be, and the truth is far more personal than anyone suspected. Director Masahiro ShinodaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Samurai Spy, filled with clan intrigue, ninja spies, and multiple double crosses, marks a bold stylistic departure from swordplay film convention.
